data.name: VRM Posing Desktop
data.detailed_description:
VRM Posing Desktop is a PC application that allows you to import your vrm files and make your 3D models pose the way you want.

## VRM Posing Desktop features

  • You can import vrm files and use them in the app.
  • A wide variety of characters are available even by default.
  • Poses can be applied to 3D models from over 300 pose presets.
  • User-to-user pose sharing with SteamWorkshop
  • Support Multiple Model
  • Rotating gizmos can be used to customize character poses.
  • You can export images with a transparent background.
  • The line of sight can be changed at will.
  • An image can be set as the background.
  • Mirror Editing of Poses.
  • Save favorite poses.
  • Facial expressions can be edited in detail.
  • Hand shape presets
  • VMC protocol support (VSeeFace and Unity integration)
  • Ability to import and export pose data

I'm actively updating this app and hope to make it better with you. The URL below is the update schedule.
https://evelyngamedev.notion.site/5bb7e50c57564d66ba72eca8aa9dc6f9?v=3e6aac0ab4ce4394bea23f903a937fe0

## Recommended for

  • People who want to use it as a reference material for illustration.
  • Vtubers who want to pose their characters for thumbnails.
  • I want to be healed by looking at my character.

## Why I developed this app

I'm Evelyn GameDev, and I do indie development and run a Youtube channel. I use a model as my avatar in my activities.

I created this application to help people who are using 3D models as their avatars in their creative activities, just like me.

data.short_description: Be creative with your 3d models! Import your VRM files into the app and make them pose in various ways.You can use it as a reference for illustrations or export images for thumbnails.Multiple charactersHigh quality screenshotsPose sharing with Workshop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 High Sierra/10.14 Mojave/10.15 Catalina
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
